questList.questDescription: Unite with the Phantom Sludge, an Abyssal Slime lurking in the Shadows of Despair, to defeat the Ancient Stone Guardian and earn passage to the next level.
Befriend the Crimson Slimer, a Bloodthirsty Ooze Devourer, to receive the Amulet of Healing in the Shadows of Despair.
Eradicate the Phantom Sludge, a Spectral Ooze Aberration, and claim the Amulet of Alliance in the Shadows of Despair.
Form a temporary alliance with the Spectral Haunter, an Ethereal Stalker Wraith, to overcome the Tidecaller Sorcerer and proceed to the next level.
Quiet the voice of the Shadow Weaver, a Whispering Horror, to gain the Amulet of Healing in the Whispers of the Void.
Vanquish the Whispering Horror, a Shadow Weaver, to claim the Amulet of Alliance in the Whispers of the Void.
Defeat the Abyssal Shade, an Abyssal Shade, to emerge victorious and win in The Abyssal Domain.
Forge an alliance with the Mossy Warden, a Bog Boggart Guardian, to acquire the Amulet of Healing in The Abyssal Domain.
Overcome the Frostbound Specter, a Freezing Wraith, to claim the Amulet of Alliance in The Abyssal Domain.
